questions.quote: Bette is recuperating right now and I'm not going to allow anything to disturb her.

All right. Look, I'll tell ya what, I'll give you $50. Now, be reasonable you cannot turn down $50 for a $6 rye.

I don't know! I'm gonna go and visit him later.  It would be nice if you got him something.
You know what I've come to realize? I'm not just bored. I genuinely dislike her.
Yeah, when the season starts. Right now, I sit around pretending that I'm busy.

because she puts up such a big stink every time I have a piece of meat.
